welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Bloomfield, a charming city known for its picturesque landscapes and friendly locals. We invite you to relax and enjoy all that our lovely city has to offer. Happy exploring!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

wifi.note: Limited free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport. Premium Wi-Fi is available for purchase.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linden Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Linden Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: Serves international airlines such as Air France, Japan Airlines, and Lufthansa.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Serves Delta Air Lines and Delta Connection.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: Serves international airlines such as British Airways, Emirates, and Singapore Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 7
terminals.description: Serves international airlines such as British Airways, Iberia, and Qantas.

terminals.name: Terminal 8
terminals.description: Serves American Airlines and American Eagle.

wifi.note: Limited free access, paid options available for faster speeds.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Westchester County Apt Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Westchester County Apt Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
